attributes.action: increase Midnight on new year's eve by six hours, and abolish Leap Years.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
If you were to put the clocks back by 6 hours at 6am, January 1st, every year, we would:

1) Have 6 more hours of partying
2) No longer need to worry about Leap Years.
3) February will no longer feel confused once every four years.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
